article_text:
If you want to learn how to make macaroni and cheese, and who doesn't, look no further than "The Mac + Cheese Cookbook," recently out from Ten Speed Press.

Or thumb through a competitor, "Melt: The Art of Macaroni and Cheese," an October release from Little, Brown & Co.

There's also "Mac 'N' Cheese to the Rescue," from Ulysses Press, which came out in April, and "Mac 'N' Cheese,"...

twitter.description: Recipe books for an American favorite, macaroni and cheese, are selling big, as authors use their noodles.
twitter.creator: @KatyMcL

image.alt: Mac-and-cheese cookbooks sell big; Thomas Jefferson would be proud
